mods.abstract: Black and white negatives taped to a piece of masking sheet advertising facts about Merle Travis, including his birthplace; major songs recorded; major albums recorded; major songs written; movies, radio, and television shows he appeared on; record label; countries; and hobbies. A strip of negative containing additional songs recorded is missing. The negatives would have been used to create a corresponding printing plate.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
